data.message: Man eminem got me through alot of shit. when ever i would have a shitty day i would go home plug in my ipod and crank up the music untill all i could hear was the music and i would just relax and listen. Before i had his music i was a little pain in the ass that had no release. now i can deal with the world because his music tamed the wild beast. thanks E. u the man and a true god of rap
